author: guitargeek
body:
Hi,

this PR aims to backport the following Fall17 V2 IDs:
* Electron cut based (from https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23477)
* Electron MVA (from https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23700)
* Photon cut based and MVA (from https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/25293)

It depends on the following external PRs:
* https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/4546 for electron MVA
* https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/4545 for photon MVA

This backport is done in a "minimal" fashion, meaning the goal was just to get the same ID functionality as in master and not backporting the full list of technical improvements between 9_4_X and master.

For the cut based IDs, backporting with cherry-picks was trivial, while the MVAs were more involved with renamed weight files for all past MVAs. Also, integrating the V2 ID was not as trivial as expected as variables were ordered and defined slightly different compared to V1. For now, this was solved with branchings in the ElectronMVAEstimatorFall17 class.
title: [9_4_X] Egamma Fall17 V2 IDs
